entry.value: insert into dbAula.bitcoin_rate(data, usd, gbp, eur) values(STR_TO_DATE('${data}', '%Y-%m-%dT%H:%i:%s+00:00'),${usd:replace(',', '')},${gbp:replace(',', '')},${eur:replace(',', '')})
